about_the_game:
Combining color matching, line defence, and some random puzzle elements, Hues of the Void is a unique and engaging take on the “x-defense” game genre.

Within these prismatic lands, you must defend yourself against the advancing knights of an oppressive theocratic order - The Chromacrusade!

Hone Your Minion Mastery


Charge your portals and release a spectrum of creatures from the Void against the onslaught of the Chromacrusade. Minions such as Slimes, Skeletons, Shades, Gazeblasters and many more are at your disposal. Once a minion has served it's purpose, dismiss them just a readily!

Scheme plots from your Inner Sanctum


Customize your load out of Artefacts, Familars and Friends! Within your Sanctum, fine-tune your menagerie of eldritch horrors and undead monstrosities, and claw your way to victory over the Chromacrusade!

With plenty of summonable monsters to unlock, synergies to uncover and experiment with, your journey is uniquely your own.

Delve into Forbidden Secrets


Follow the trail of the Chromacrusade, right to the very source! Lead your Summoners to victory through Story Mode, following the story of the Prismatic Lands, unlocking more along the way.

As your grand pilgrimage through the Story campaign is complete, dive into endless mode! You can test your most clever combinations and skills against ever-increasing waves of unique and challenging enemies.

The vibrant and colorful world of Hues of the Void offers uniquely challenging gameplay experience.

As a small family team, it's our sincerest hope to provide an entertaining and engrossing game for players of all ages; it will test your skills and keep you engaged throughout many hours of gameplay!
